about_the_game:
Rayless Blade is an open world, pixel art RPG with JRPG style turn combat that employs timed attacks AND dynamic combat.

As you traverse the massive hi-bit pixel art world, you'll encounter many individuals along the way that can be recruited to your team to help you fight and explore. You'll be able to recruit and command up to 3 other members at a time.

Obtain experience and hidden/randomized loot by solving puzzles, searching obscured areas, and defeating enemies. Use the experience you've earned to spec points into abilities and the loot you’ve earned to upgrade your own gear or your team's gear, you'll need it!

Go through all of the effort to one day, maybe, escape your terrible destiny; the destiny assigned to you by God himself. You are trapped on a remote island controlled by a vindictive tyrant who in turn is a puppet to a greater power that claims the status of God. in a world where free will does not exist for its inhabitants, it is up to you and your team to try their best to liberate the people and defeat the malicious creature that rules them.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of violence (blood, guns, swords, death) that may not be suitable for all audiences. Player discretion is advised.
